suite.name: script_002_DNF Unit of use size reference set (700000141000036106)

test.name: 01 Some 700000141000036106 [Unit of use size reference set] entries exist

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select count(*) from rf2_cr_ccsrefset_active where refsetId = 700000141000036106;

test.name: 02 700000141000036106 [Unit of use size reference set] is a child of 700001351000036100|Measurement type float (foundation metadata concept)
03 All active referencedComponents are active 30548011000036101 [has unit of use]

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from rf2_cr_ccsrefset_active where refsetId = 700000141000036106 and referencedComponentId not in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active where typeId = 30548011000036101);

test.name: 03b All active 30548011000036101 [has unit of use] relationships are actively referenced (except where sourceId IS MPUU or TPUU)

parameter.name: query

test.name: 04 All UnitIds are Kinds of 30428011000036107 [unit of measure]

parameter.name: query

test.name: 05 All OperatorIds are Kinds of 700001311000036104 [Operator id value]

parameter.name: query
query
query

test.name: 08 All UoU.Size values are greater than zero

parameter.name: query
